root.message: The SDG_GOAL field for indicator 9-5-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: 9: Building Resilient Infrastructures, Promoting Inclusive and Sustainable Industrialization and Fostering Innovation.
9: Construir Infraestruturas Resilientes, Promover a Industrialização Inclusiva e Sustentável e Fomentar a Inovação.
